mean_en: a person who performs various physical exercises on a mat or on special equipment as part of an athletic competition :a person who participates in the sport of gymnastics
sentence: Gymnasts use their body weight very skillfully.
sentence_trans: 体操运动员能够极为娴熟地运用自身的体重（来完成动作） 。
word_etyma: gymn\u003dgym健身房 + ast表示人 → gymnast体操家
